body: Tagoe shares memories of 2010 with his readers: "5. South Africa shames critics, Asamoah Gyan disappoints Africa: In June-July South Africa, proved its critics wrong by staging a very colorful and memorable World Cup. This was the very first time an African nation had organised a world cup event..."

title: Ghana: Ghana 2010 - My Top 10 Memories
